title: Very aggravating high ping
body:
Okay, I've been playing league for a little over a year now. Everywhere I go, doesn't matter if it's to a friends house, at a truck stop, even my own house, I have a very, very outstanding ping.  Normally my ping is between 54-85 ... Which is normal for me. 

But here lately I'm getting 500-9000 PING.... 
And as soon as I hit 500 ping, it lags me out.

Now I don't know about you but I enjoy playing league. It's an escape for me and I enjoy the relief.
This has been going on for the past few weeks now and I want to know if this is normal?

I have amazing internet connection at my house and to be pinged out and, then counted for because of an issue that has absolutely nothing to do with my connection, banned from the que for 20 mins is highly pissing me off. 

This is the 5th time in the past 3 weeks that I'm going to have to wait another 20 mins because of this issue.

Now I know there are PLENTY of these "High Ping" out there and I've not seen a solution yet. 

So can someone out there please explain as to why this is so high? 
Was it an update? Something just not going right?

I mean this game has been out for quite some time and there are still bugs in it.....


-very unhappy player-

Mate... the reason you are lagging out is cause of bad routes your ISP might be giving you. Outstanding ISP may even have bad routes because their priority is not to provide you lag free gaming but outstanding download speed and browsing speed. 

You should use a vpn to fix your routes... get [Kill Ping](http://www.killping.com). This should fix your high ping problems.

Hey Pingiwin,

I understand your frustration since I was having the same issues at my place. I gave Riots Connection KB a try after a friend gave it to me and it worked wonders for my ping. You should give it a try and see if that helps you out as well 

Riots Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Good luck to ya.
